message: Added the replay one/all and stop after this song buttons.

title: Cleaned up the initialization code. Now, the song lists submit song requests…
message: Cleaned up the initialization code. Now, the song lists submit song requests when the user clicks on a song. The MusicService reads from the SongRequest class and decides on whether or not to play the song. The MusicPlayer won't play a song if the submitted song was already accepted (aka played already and the activity was restarted) or if the song is null.)

message: Bug fixes.

message: Added basic shuffle functionality

title: The bugfix included in the last commit showed a play icon that was too large…
message: The bugfix included in the last commit showed a play icon that was too large (48dp). This has been reduced to 24dp

title: Fixed bug where, after pausing a song, minimizing the app and reopening it, the…
message: Fixed bug where, after pausing a song, minimizing the app and reopening it, the pause button would show and the pulsator would look like its playing. Now, the play button is shown and the pulsator is at the appropriate duration.

title: I think I stopped MusicService from being killed by making it always show a…
message: I think I stopped MusicService from being killed by making it always show a notification - apparently a service needs an open notification to not be killed.

title: Fixed the bug where the player wouldn't move to the next song upon completion.
message: Fixed the bug where the player wouldn't move to the next song upon completion.

title: Made the playlist loading code get individual playlist songs faster so that the…
message: Made the playlist loading code get individual playlist songs faster so that the app doesn't have to wait until receiving the whole result before allowing the user to use next/previous to get to it.

title: Removed most of the logic that focused on adding songs to the database. That now…
message: Removed most of the logic that focused on adding songs to the database. That now runs on a separate thread of MusicService

title: Tried some optimizations where I only add new realm objects if they don't…
message: Tried some optimizations where I only add new realm objects if they don't already exist. Also checks to see if all permissions were granted. Otherwise, the app exits.

title: PlayActivity will no longer try to play a song if it doesn't come with a…
message: PlayActivity will no longer try to play a song if it doesn't come with a playlist. Fixed the previous button bug

title: Gets list of sound files in the same directory/list as the one being opened and…
message: Gets list of sound files in the same directory/list as the one being opened and adds that to a new playlist. The user can now move to the previous or next song in the list and it loops around. The notification buttons also work for previous and next. Upon first launch, MainActivity automatically redirects the user to the appropriate activity.

title: Added startForegroundActivity as well as a notification to go with it. Media can…
message: Added startForegroundActivity as well as a notification to go with it. Media can be paused/played from the notification.

title: Added an AllSongs activity where it lists all detected songs. Added support for…
message: Added an AllSongs activity where it lists all detected songs. Added support for .flac, .wav, etc files.  Fixed bugs caused by various Android lifecycle states.

message: Added better visualizations and added a marquee scrolling text. Also fixed some bugs
